other_tests.findings: No active infection with rubella virus, enteric cytopathic human orphan (ECHO) virus, coxsackievirus, cytomegalovirus, Epstein-Barr virus, herpes simplex virus 1 and 2, HIV 1 and 2, and toxoplasma gondii.
Negative for possible leukemia and lymphoma.
Negative anti BP-180 and anti BP-230 antibodies; normal leukocyte formula.
